mapper.select: SELECT feed_number, account, comment, picture_address FROM feed_post WHERE account = #{account} ORDER BY feed_number DESC;
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT feed_number FROM post_bookmark WHERE bookmark_user = #{account}) AS A JOIN feed_post AS B ON a.feed_number = b.feed_number ORDER BY created_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT Count(feed_number) AS myfeedcount FROM feed_post WHERE account = #{account}) AS myfeedcount, (SELECT Count(number) AS followernum FROM follow WHERE follower = #{account}) AS followernum, (SELECT Count(number) AS followeenum FROM follow WHERE followee = #{account}) AS followeenum;
